articles.title: Apple unveils redesigned interfaces for iPhones, iPads, Macs and Watches
articles.description: Apple announced a new look and a new name to its devices’ operating systems, while also promising to open up its systems further to let developers create new AI features.
articles.content:
The company’s ’Liquid Glass’ makeover comes alongside software updates that include live language translation, tighter control over scam texts and calls and a more windows-like experience for iPads

articles.title: Italian Referendum to Loosen Citizenship Rules Fails
articles.description: Less than a third of eligible voters turned out for a poll that would have made it easier for foreigners to become citizens, and strengthened labor rights.
articles.content:
A referendum that sought to make it easier for foreigners to apply for Italian citizenship ended unsuccessfully on Monday when it failed to draw a majority of voters to the polls.
Polls closed at 3 p.m. with around 30 percent of eligible voters havin... [586 chars]

articles.title: Trump to promote $1,000 ‘Trump Accounts’ for newborns at White House event
articles.description: President Donald Trump is set to host a roundtable at the White House on Monday to promote a key feature of the sweeping Republican domestic policy bill – a provision that would provide every American newborn with a $1,000 investment account, a White House official told CNN.
articles.content:

articles.title: Deterrence and intimidation drive Trump threats to arrest Newsom in L.A. standoff
articles.description: White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said President Trump called in the National Guard with the expectation that it would 'hopefully prevent and deter some of this violence.'
articles.content:
President Trump, speaking to reporters Monday, suggested that California Gov. Gavin Newsom should be arrested over his handling of unrest in Los Angeles.

articles.title: Landmark test for coeliac disease promises to take away the pain of diagnosis
articles.description: Imagine having to eat something that makes you sick – just to see what’s making you ill in the first place.
articles.content:
Coeliac disease is one of the most common autoimmune illnesses in Australia, caused by an immune reaction to the gluten protein found in wheat, rye and barley. More than 350,000 Australians currently live with the condition.

articles.title: NASA raises the odds that an asteroid could hit the moon in 2032
articles.description: Asteroid 2024 YR4, once the highest impact risk ever recorded, now poses no threat to Earth but has a slightly increased chance of striking the moon in 2032.
articles.content:
Asteroid 2024 YR4, once considered the highest impact risk to Earth ever recorded, is back in the spotlight — this time due to a slight increase in the chance that it could impact the moon in 2032.
Although now too distant to observe from Earth, the ... [3920 chars]

articles.title: Universal nanosensor unlocks the secrets to plant growth
articles.description: Researchers from the Singapore-MIT Alliance for Research and Technology developed the world’s first near-infrared fluorescent nanosensor capable of monitoring a plant’s primary growth hormone in real-time and without harming the plant.

articles.title: CHR mulls completion of EJK probe by end of the year
articles.description: The Commission on Human Rights (CHR) is eyeing to wrap up its years-long investigation into the alleged extrajudicial killings (EJKs) under the Duterte administration’s bloody drug war by the end of the year.
